summary: A structured output object for a universal segmentation model that bundles loss, class logits, mask logits, auxiliary decoder predictions, encoder/pixel decoder/transformer hidden states, query embeddings, task token, and attention weights, enabling downstream post‑processing into semantic, instance, or panoptic segmentation.
business_intent: Provide a single, comprehensive representation of model predictions and internal states to support both training (loss computation) and inference (post‑processing) for multi‑task segmentation applications.
